newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Morocco central bank injects 2.5 bln dirhams.
newsitem.headline: Morocco central bank injects 2.5 bln dirhams.

text.p: Bank al-Maghrib injected 2.495 billion dirhams into the money market for one week at its repurchase auction, a bank official said on Wednesday.
The bank rceived bids totalling 5.945 billion dirhams and allocated 4.560 billion dirhams at 6.5 percent interest rate. That was more than 2.065 billion dirhams leaving the market this week.
It satisfied 76.70 percent of the demand for liquidity.
The next auction is due on April 16, 1997.
